title: Genocidal Jew-Haters Attack Christmas Across America
text: [[ December 24, 2023 ] ](https://gellerreport.com/2023/12/genocidal-jew-haters-attack-christmas-across-america.html/) ‚ÄúPalestinianism‚Äô is Islamic jihad and they hate you. In San Francisco, pro-Palestinian protesters threw Christmas ornaments off a Christmas tree and hung their Palestinian flag in place of the ornaments [pic.twitter.com/rcn9HSZihK] ‚Äî Marina Medvin üá∫üá∏ (@MarinaMedvin) [December 24, 2023] New York ‚Äì Jihadis are on 5th avenue, terrorizing shoppers, shouting "no Christmas" anti-Jewish stuff and threats towards the west in general üá∫üá∏ [pic.twitter.com/WBJ91vFIdx] ‚Äî üá¨üáßRonEnglishüá¨üáßüè¥ (@RonEng1ish) [December 23, 2023] Pro-Palestinian protesters block the highway right outside O‚Äôhare International airport in Chicago just ahead of one of the busiest travel weeks of the year. Blocking traffic in Chicago for Palestine! ‚úäüèª [pic.twitter.com/j7GcUsFJ2o] ‚Äî Libs of TikTok (@libsoftiktok) [December 24, 2023] [#BREAKING]: Protesters have entered the Tacoma Mall and are following through with their planned demonstration and disrupting holiday shoppers. Antifa and people associated with the Black Panther party are marching through the mall and trying to get others to join. He is a communist who called for the genocide of white people, writing‚Äî ‚Äúwhite death will mean liberation for all.‚Äù His conclusion: ‚ÄúI hate you because you shouldn‚Äôt exist.
